name: Outro
_source: speak;Tana;Ephraim!|I'd glad to see that your spirits are up.
speak;Ephraim;Ah, Tana.|And I have you to thank for it.
speak;Tana;It was nothing.|As long as you're back to your old self, that is thanks enough.
speak;Larachel;I'm holding it in my very hand!|The Stone of Rausten!|Its glorious radiance suits my complexion, wouldn't you say?
speak;Ephraim;This is it.|The last one.|The last remaining Sacred Stone.
speak;Larachel;It is.|And the time to defeat the Demon King draws near.
speak;Eirika;We should be leaving.|We have to act before those creatures gain more momentum.
speak;Myrrh;Yes.|We should make haste.|The poison spreads.|It is growing ever stronger.
speak;Myrrh;Darkling Woods...|Where the Demon King fell...
speak;Mansel;L'Arachel, must you leave so soon?|You've only just returned, and you have to leave?
speak;Larachel;Uncle, defeating evil is the highest calling I can perform.
speak;Mansel;Of course, my dear.|It is a divine calling, but...
speak;Larachel;You needn't worry, Uncle.|After all, I'm not on my own.|I have my friends.
speak;Mansel;I see.|You've been blessed, L'Arachel.|Blessed with many good friends.
speak;Larachel;I am indeed, Uncle.|And they, in turn, are blessed with me!|Farewell, Uncle.|I shall return.|Once evil has been vanquished, we'll all return safe and sound.
speak;Mansel;Hold on.|Not so fast now.|I have something I wish to present to Prince Ephraim as well.
speak;Mansel;That's right, Prince.|I'd like you to accept this gift.
speak;Larachel;Oh!|Aren't those...|Aren't those the Sacred Twins of Rausten?

speak;Mansel;That's right, dear niece.|These are the weapons of Saint Latona, most holy father of Rausten.|Here, we have glorious Ivaldi, and its twin, the divine Staff of Latona.|I will also spare some funding to feed and arm your forces.|After all, there is much that you must do before you leave these halls.
speak;Larachel;So they are the blessed Latona's most sacred relics...|Is this allowed?

speak;Mansel;I know the law, L'Arachel.|The relics must never leave the temple, with the sole exception of the occasional ascension ceremony, but I think that, when the world needs saving, we can make the odd exception.
speak;Mansel;You will return them, of course...|once you've finished your task.|Prince Ephraim, I would have your oath on this.
speak;Larachel;Darkling Woods is home to naught but demons now.|Indeed, I hear tell that none who enter its borders ever leave again.|We ought to stock up on supplies in town before we set out.
speak;Ephraim;Yes, I think stocking up would be in our best interest.|I intended to see that we all return unharmed.
speak;Larachel;My beloved countrymen!|The combat was fierce, but you protected the palace honorably.|The valorous Knights of Rausten shall live on in story and song!
speak;SoldierGreen;Thank you, my lady.|As always, it is our honor to serve.|Prince Ephraim, before you go, please take this tome.|We pray for your swift and safe return!
speak;Ephraim;As I pray for your safety, too.|I won't let your valorous deeds be wasted this day!
speak;Larachel;As long as the righteousness of justice fills our hearts, how can we lose?|Men, I ask that you watch after my dear uncle.
speak;SoldierGreen;You have our world, my lady.|In the twin names of justice and order!
